data.title: Manhunt on ITV cast: Who is in the cast of Levi Bellfield drama series?
data.meta_description: MANHUNT is a brand new ITV miniseries charting the capture of serial killer Levi Bellfield. But who is in the cast of the hard-hitting drama led by Martin Clunes?
data.text:
Manhunt: Martin Clunes stars in true story crime drama

ITV will be airing Manhunt this evening (Sunday, January 6) at 9pm. The three-part series will be broadcast over the next three consecutive nights as the story unfolds. Manhunt is based on the memoirs of real-life Metropolitan Police detective Colin Sutton, who successfully caught murderer Levi Bellfield. Silent Witness and Rillington Place writer Ed Whitmore has penned the script for Manhunt, which will recount the harrowing case.

Manhunt will show how the murder of French student Amélie Delagrange on Twickenham Green in August 2004 was eventually linked to two other murders: Marsha McDonnell in 2003 and the abduction and murder of Milly Dowler in 2002.

The ITV miniseries will start with the brutal killing of 22-year-old Delagrange, who was attacked with a hammer as she was walking home after a night out with friends.

Manhunt will then see experienced officer DCI Sutton assigned to the case as he seeks to bring the perpetrator to justice.

Sutton is determined to catch the killer despite having very little evidence and taking a meticulous approach before getting a breakthrough in the case.

Who is in the cast of Manhunt on ITV?

DCI Colin Sutton - Martin Clunes

Doc Martin and Men Behaving Badly actor Martin Clunes leads the cast as the tenacious DCI Colin Sutton, whose hard work leads to the eventual imprisonment of Bellfield.

Clunes’ other credits include Arthur & George, ITV’s recently Vanity Fair adaptation and The Town.

Levi Bellfield - Celyn Jones

Critically-acclaimed actor and writer Celyn Jones portrays convicted serial killer Levi Bellfield as he’s tracked and captured by the police.

Jones has served as a writer on films The Vanishing and Set Fire to the Stars as well as playing Dylan Thomas in the latter.

His other roles include TV series Stella, Da Vinci’s Demons, Above Suspicion and Grange Hill.

Amélie Delagrange - Kiera Bell

Up-and-coming actress Kiera Bell takes on role of French national and victim Amélie Delagrange, whose death sparks a huge hunt for her killer.

Bell has had small parts in the likes of Ready Player One, The End of the F***ing World and Karl Pilkington’s Sick of It.

Marsha McDonnell - Hannah Banks

Rising star Hannah Banks plays another victim Marsha McDonnell, who died in hospital after she was attacked near her home in Hampton, London.

Banks has had a number of roles in Obey, Teen Spirit and The Death and Life of John F. Donovan.

ITV tease exciting new dramas for 2019

Dominique Delagrange - Michèle Belgrand

Michèle Belgrand takes on the part of Dominique Delagrange, the bereft mother of Amélie.

Belgrand is no stranger to audiences with roles in Outlander, Benjamin and A Private War.

DS Jo Brunt - Katie Lyons

Katie Lyons is police officer DS Jo Brunt, who assisted Sutton in the investigation and spoke to a number of Bellfield’s ex-girlfriends.

Lyons has starred in TV shows Bluestone 42 and The Crimson Petal and the White as well as featuring in an episode of Call the Midwife.

Manhunt airs on ITV tonight at 9pm
